医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
经常使用手机会增加吸烟者和糖尿病患者患心血管疾病的风险一项新研究发现，经常使用手机与心血管疾病风险呈正相关，特别是对于当前吸烟者和糖尿病患者。此外，这种关联部分归因于睡眠不佳、心理困扰和神经质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Regular-mobile-phone-use-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-smokers-and-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Regular-mobile-phone-use-linked-to-increased-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-smokers-and-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43cf0bb8-76bc-40ce-a4a7-2d7666cc3d2e Wed, 04 Sep 2024 07:20:31 -0400 Regular mobile phone use linked to increased cardiovascular disease risk in smokers and diabetics
对于非职业运动员来说，运动脑震荡可能与长期认知风险无关新南威尔士大学医学研究人员领导的一项研究表明，运动相关脑震荡（SRC）可能与非职业运动员的长期认知风险无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Sports-concussions-may-not-be-lated-to-long-term-cognitive-risks-for-non-professional-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Sports-concussions-may-not-be-lated-to-long-term-cognitive-risks-for-non-professional-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53d20fd7-c0c0-4cb9-8e2a-1e40f0c924a2 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 07:17:12 -0400 Sports concussions may not be related to long-term cognitive risks for non-professional athletes
索马鲁肽不会增加抑郁或自杀念头的风险宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，服用减肥药物索马鲁肽不会增加没有已知重大精神健康障碍的人出现抑郁症状、自杀想法或自杀行为的风险。本周《美国医学会杂志内科》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Semaglutide-does-not-increase-risk-of-depression-or-suicidal-thoughts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Semaglutide-does-not-increase-risk-of-depression-or-suicidal-thoughts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8330d76-b117-433f-903a-7a054653c305 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 07:06:28 -0400 Semaglutide does not increase risk of depression or suicidal thoughts
亚裔美国人和太平洋岛民女性乳腺癌发病率上升2018 年夏天，克里斯蒂娜·柏田 (Christina Kashiwada) 在出差时注意到左乳房有一个发痒的小肿块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Breast-cancer-rises-among-Asian-American-And-Pacific-Islander-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Breast-cancer-rises-among-Asian-American-And-Pacific-Islander-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebce0cd3-fb4b-478a-ba5e-7be946437ee7 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 06:38:00 -0400 Breast cancer rises among Asian American and Pacific Islander women
随着家庭兴趣减弱，儿科医生减少了新冠疫苗接种当儿科医生埃里克·鲍尔打开装满儿童疫苗的冰箱时，所有预期的疫苗都在那里——DTaP、脊髓灰质炎疫苗、肺炎球菌疫苗——除了一剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/As-interest-from-families-wanes-pediatricians-scale-back-on-covid-shots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/As-interest-from-families-wanes-pediatricians-scale-back-on-covid-shots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16ce2f12-6497-47fb-95f2-295d57290cee Wed, 04 Sep 2024 06:35:27 -0400 As interest from families wanes, pediatricians scale back on covid shots
结直肠癌治疗后患者的生活方式干预最近的一项随机对照试验表明，HEAL ABC 干预对于 87% 的结直肠癌幸存者来说是可行的，支持健康的生活方式改变和改善福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Lifestyle-interventions-in-患者-after-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Lifestyle-interventions-in-患者-after-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02349fed-ba00-4eb6-989c-995935b62058 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 06:34:00 -0400 Lifestyle interventions in patients after colorectal cancer treatment
Avadel Pharmaceuticals 宣布发布 RESTORE 数据，强调每晚两次羟丁酸盐面临的挑战以及患者对每晚一次 LUMRYZ™ 给药（羟丁酸钠）缓释口服混悬液 (CIII) 的强烈偏好Avadel Pharmaceuticals plc 是一家专注于改变药物以改变生活的生物制药公司，今天宣布发布 RESTORE 开放标签/转换研究的最终数据，表明发作性睡病患者更喜欢睡前服用一次 LUMRYZ，而不是每晚服用两次-释放羟丁治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Avadel-Pharmaceuticals-announces-publication-of-RESTORE-data-highlighting-challenges-with-twice-nightly-oxybates-and-strong-patent-preference-每晚一次-LUMRYZe284a2-给药-(羟丁酸钠)-缓释-口服混悬液-(CIII).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Avadel-Pharmaceuticals-announces-publication-of-RESTORE-data-highlighting-challenges-with-twice-nightly-oxybates-and-strong-patent-preference-每晚一次-LUMRYZe284a2-给药-(羟丁酸钠)-缓释-口服混悬液-(CIII).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42e1569c-1a04-4672-9d38-810d4b1fcf1b Wed, 04 Sep 2024 06:23:00 -0400 Avadel Pharmaceuticals announces publication of RESTORE data highlighting challenges with twice-nightly oxybates and strong patient preference for once-nightly LUMRYZ™ dosing (sodium oxybate) extended-release oral suspension (CIII)
新的全球分析凸显微量营养素短缺研究表明，近 50 亿人缺乏必需的微量营养素，其中钙、碘和维生素 E 的严重缺乏影响着全球健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/New-global-analysis-highlights-micro Nutrition-shortages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/New-global-analysis-highlights-micro Nutrition-shortages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aa1c651-ee5e-44b6-860b-cd5ecfe70e4b Wed, 04 Sep 2024 05:53:00 -0400 New global analysis highlights micronutrient shortages
了解 BMI 对亚洲结直肠癌风险的影响研究人员报告说，亚洲人群的体重指数值可以预测患结直肠癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Understanding-the-impact-of-BMI-on-colorectal-cancer-risk-in-Asia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Understanding-the-impact-of-BMI-on-colorectal-cancer-risk-in-Asia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=660a5372-e3e2-4274-8b71-9c90253d8cec Wed, 04 Sep 2024 05:06:00 -0400 Understanding the impact of BMI on colorectal cancer risk in Asia
空气污染会导致痴呆吗？长期接触空气污染是导致痴呆症的一个关键因素，PM2.5 和 NO2 等污染物与认知能力下降和神经退行性疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Does-air-pollution-drive-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240904/Does-air-pollution-drive-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d412be1-b677-4df2-a3ab-a155bd255938 Wed, 04 Sep 2024 04:34:00 -0400 Does air pollution drive dementia?
